page.title: 03Shurlock Row Village
page.content:
{Shurlock Row}is a small village on the edge of the {Thames Valley}. The village has one main street with one side road.
There is a Post Office and General Store and a Butcher in the village. The village also has two pubs, The White Hart and The Star.
There is a church and a private school in the village.
Most of the housing in the centre of the village consists of either older or larger properties. Around the fringes of the village there are a number of smaller ex-workman's houses.
